page.title: 05A Day in the life
page.content: I'm Laura, l4, & I live with my dad (he(s divorced). Last Saturday, dad rose at 8.00am. After washing, he fed Joey (our cat), ate breakfast, and went for a bike ride. Meanwhile, I stayed in bed gazing at my posters of 'Wham & 'Frankie'. At 9.30 I dragged myself downstairs and watched the 'Saturday Morning Picture Show'in the kitchen. I took the TV to the sitting room and ate breakfast (muesli, wholemeal toast & coffee.) After a shower I dressed and we left for Gosforth at l0.50 arriving at my dad's girlfriends 20 minutes later. We took the Metro to Newcastle after coffee. We bought groceries at the Green Market, had a snack at the Antiques Supermarket, and returned to Coral's at 2.30. After dinner, we returned home where we found Joey miaowing its head off.
